imageprocessing

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • imageprocessing.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores the colors of a given pixel
    Author:
    Constantin Gheorghe

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int bits 
      private int blue 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Color(int pixel)
      Constructor with parameters that gets the colors of a pixel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decreaseColorDepth(int bits)
      Method that decreases the color depth of a pixel Each value from each channel RGB are equals and they are represented on 8 bits This method decreases this 8 bits and replaces all values from each RGB channel with new value computed
      int getColor()
      Method that uses bitwise operations to create a new pixel (int) using same blue value for all 3 channels RGB

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Color

        public Color(int pixel)
        Constructor with parameters that gets the colors of a pixel
        Parameters:
        pixel - is a 32bit integer

    • Method Detail

      • decreaseColorDepth

        public void decreaseColorDepth(int bits)
        Method that decreases the color depth of a pixel Each value from each channel RGB are equals and they are represented on 8 bits This method decreases this 8 bits and replaces all values from each RGB channel with new value computed
        Parameters:
        bits - is the new number of bits used to represent colors (ranges from 1 to 7)

      • getColor

        public int getColor()
        Method that uses bitwise operations to create a new pixel (int) using same blue value for all 3 channels RGB
